PassiveDesc.Name: Thought Gear: Target
PassiveDesc.Desc: Prioritizes targeting the last enemy that attacked Eileen on the previous Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Thought Gear: Predict
PassiveDesc.Desc: Once per Scene, respond to a one-sided attack with an Evade die [Roll: 5-10]. (Not played in clashes where both characters use a Combat Page)

PassiveDesc.Name: Meat Gear: Production
PassiveDesc.Desc: Each time the phase shifts, a Gear Worshipper is spawned for each Gear Worshipper defeated.

PassiveDesc.Name: Meat Gear: Demise
PassiveDesc.Desc: On the Scene after which a Gear Worshipper dies, uses the Combat Page 'Thought Gear: Brainwash'.

PassiveDesc.Name: Zeal of the Believers
PassiveDesc.Desc: Worshippers that are alive by the end of a phase fully recover HP and Stagger Resist.

PassiveDesc.Name: Meat Gear: Role
PassiveDesc.Desc: Whenever a Gear Worshipper is defeated, Eileen takes 125 Stagger damage.

PassiveDesc.Name: Faith of the Believers
PassiveDesc.Desc: When Eileen's HP reaches 350, it will not drop below that threshold until the phase shifts; the same occurs at 150 HP. After Eileen's HP reaches a threshold, the battle will progress to the next phase.

PassiveDesc.Name: Fumigating Smoke
PassiveDesc.Desc: Every Scene, all allies gain Smoke equal to the amount of Smoke this character has.

PassiveDesc.Name: Aerosol Diffusion
PassiveDesc.Desc: While alive, allies gain the effect of 'Puffy Brume'.

PassiveDesc.Name: Oxide Overload
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon death, allies are inflicted with 10 Smoke and lose the effect of 'Puffy Brume'.

PassiveDesc.Name: Prognosis
PassiveDesc.Desc: Every 5 Scenes: a copy of 'Thought Gear: Advent' is added to hand, which will be used the same Scene.
